Package com.flipkart.rest

Class CourseManagementController

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.rest.CourseManagementController
@Path("/course")
public class CourseManagementController
extends java.lang.Object
The Course Management controller. All the operations for creating, getting, listing, deleting and updating courses into course catalog.

    Instantiates a new Course Management controller.

    • deleteCourse

      @DELETE @Path("/delete/{courseId}") @Produces("text/plain") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteCourse​(@PathParam("courseId") int courseId)
      Delete a course from course id
      Parameters:
      courseId - the course id of the course to be deleted
      Returns:

    • updateCourse
